title: Paparazzi
author: Lady Gaga
lyrics:
[00:08.30] We are the crowd
[00:10.08] We're c-coming out
[00:11.98] Got my flash on, it's true
[00:14.01] Need that picture of you
[00:15.97] It's so magical
[00:19.10] We'd be so fantastical
[00:22.60] 
[00:25.15] Leather and jeans
[00:26.74] Garage glamorous
[00:28.75] Not sure what it means
[00:30.87] But this photo of us
[00:32.78] It don't have a price
[00:35.65] Ready for those flashing lights
[00:39.37] 'Cause you know that, baby, I
[00:41.97] I'm your biggest fan
[00:43.28] I'll follow you until you love me
[00:47.13] Papa-paparazzi
[00:50.13] Baby, there's no other superstar
[00:53.08] You know that I'll be
[00:54.86] Your papa-paparazzi
[00:58.52] Promise I'll be kind
[01:01.37] But I won't stop until that boy is mine
[01:06.93] Baby, you'll be famous
[01:08.66] Chase you down until you love me
[01:12.00] Papa-paparazzi
[01:16.53] 
[01:23.67] I'll be your girl
[01:25.13] Backstage at your show
[01:27.16] Velvet ropes and guitars
[01:29.16] Yeah, 'cause you're my rock star
[01:31.11] In between the sets
[01:34.09] Eyeliner and cigarettes
[01:40.13] Shadow is burnt yellow, dance and we turn
[01:43.82] My lashes are dry
[01:45.87] Purple teardrops I cry
[01:47.82] It don't have a price
[01:50.83] Loving you is cherry pie
[01:54.64] 'Cause you know that, baby, I
[01:57.03] I'm your biggest fan
[01:58.49] I'll follow you until you love me
[02:02.19] Papa-paparazzi
[02:05.29] Baby, there's no other superstar
[02:08.16] You know that I'll be
[02:10.06] Your papa-paparazzi
[02:13.53] Promise I'll be kind
[02:16.45] But I won't stop until that boy is mine
[02:22.04] Baby, you'll be famous
[02:23.82] Chase you down until you love me
[02:27.18] Papa-paparazzi
[02:30.08] Real good, we dance in the studio
[02:34.30] Snap, snap, to that shit on the radio
[02:39.04] Don't stop for anyone
[02:43.00] We're plastic, but we still have fun
[02:47.07] I'm your biggest fan
[02:48.56] I'll follow you until you love me
[02:52.17] Papa-paparazzi
[02:55.27] Baby, there's no other superstar
[02:58.23] You know that I'll be
[03:00.30] Your papa-paparazzi
[03:03.63] Promise I'll be kind
[03:06.50] But I won't stop until that boy is mine
[03:12.02] Baby, you'll be famous
[03:13.83] Chase you down until you love me
[03:17.14] Papa-paparazzi
[03:19.44]
